skins.shipDescription: Sendai-class light cruiser number three ®C Naka.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Naka, Sendai-class light cruiser number three! Due to certain circumstances, my construction was delayed, I was redeployed to place after place, and my service record as the flagship of Desron 4 isn't much to brag about... but that's okay! I'll still work my butt off to try to surpass my sisters!
skins.acquisition: Nice to meet you, Commander! I'm the light cruiser Naka! My sisters are better known than me, but I swear that one day I'll be even more famous than them!
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander! I'll try to be the best secretary you've ever had!
skins.details: Commander, would you like to study together with me?
skins.secretaryIdle1: If it looks like there's nothing for me to do, would you mind if I did a little training on my own? I won't get in the way of your work!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Jintsuu is wise, Sendai is strong... but I'll work my way towards both brains and brawn! ...Ahahah, though I'm not sure if I can actually do it.
skins.secretaryIdle3: If you're tired, would you like me to give you a good relaxation tip? I actually know quite a lot about it~
skins.secretaryTouch: Hum hum~? Oh, sorry, am I disturbing you in the middle of work...?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eek! ...Please, Commander, try to stay focused on your work while in the office!

skins.shipDescription: Ahaha! Another big one's coming~! Phew~ that felt amazing~! Ah, Commander, let's hit the waves together, shall we?
skins.acquisition: Ahaha! Another big one's coming~! Phew~ that felt amazing~! Ah, Commander, let's hit the waves together, shall we?
skins.login: We've gotta warm up before hitting the waves! C'mon, Commander, don't keep me waiting!
skins.details: I heard that surfing is a great way to sharpen your motor skills, especially your sense of balance! C'mon, let's give it a try!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Sendai, how'd you split that watermelon blindfolded...?! Th-that was so cool...!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'm sure Jintsuu will be writing some report like "The Status of the Waves and Water in this Sea Region" after our vacation is over. Hahaha!
skins.secretaryIdle3: It sure feels nice to just float around and let the waves sweep you away~
skins.secretaryTouch: Hehe, Commander~ Did you just offer to give me a massage~?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander... if you do this kind of stuff on the beach, all the girls will hate you, you know?
